audioText: Il importe que vous racontiez cette histoire au colonel russe.
question: Il ______ que vous racontiez cette histoire au colonel russe.
explanation: The text states 'Il importe que vous racontiez cette histoire au colonel russe' - It matters that you tell this story to the Russian colonel. 'Importe' is the present tense third person singular of 'importer' (to matter), used in the impersonal construction 'il importe que', which requires the subjunctive mood.
source: Strategic targeting - importe + racontes + colonel + russe synergy + military communication
